body:
Hi all

I have three glare related questions 1. Is it possible to pinpoint luminance values(for example the maximum value) to my image like this:

[
](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5wu8U2Maqbi*W6QwpBSqSLi3wQN1bWIdAauSHZ9AGsLN6c3-5SFzn9H96H7Oz1tYRIPubE-og5OpS40fS*eoIr*VclynLbmY/glare.PNG) 2. How can I set a minimum value to the legend? There is an input for the maximum value, but not for the minimum. The mask threshold doesn't quite do what I want because I don't want the surfaces with luminance values below the minimum value to be black.

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5wu8U2MaqbgsAWbCMc5WmQVy2bdWm*-2S4-7WRhRH49STL2Ans6bjZieERHifPELfNfADOfOYBBh0ZlrSZh0TamcYeOi9hcQ/glare2.PNG)
3. The glare analysis component has an output for 'image with task position', but when I connect a task position and angle, I get an empty output. Why does this happen? (UPDATE: RUNNING THE UPDATE AGAIN AND REPLACING THE COMPONENT SOLVED THIS)

[
](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5wu8U2MaqbhpMZlQOaHvTLn-fJD50QOxQTxyutWyevS*DEfxTr6DwMqHgY661EmwR3mXOjDBCEcAEl-AvHJyRozvbr-GG064/glare3.PNG) Thank you for your help
topic: Glara analysis - specific values on image, legend parameters, and image with task position
